Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Reroute at Armitage/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Pulaski, North Ave, Central Park, and Armitage due to, street blockage near Armitage/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Pulaski, North Ave, Central Park, and Armitage due to, street blockage near Armitage/Hamlin.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Howard.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
